Bullseye Aegis

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I put Bullseye Aegis on a character with Stealth?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Your character would then have Brave and Stealth and they would cancel each other out.
